title: Fix Deform package asmdef references and DEFORM_AVAILABLE conditional compilation
body:
Context: External package com.beans.deform exists but asmdef references are misconfigured so DEFORM_AVAILABLE is not respected.
Tasks:
- Verify asmdef dependencies between Vastcore assemblies and Deform assemblies
- Ensure define constraints and optional references align
- Add editor/runtime test to validate conditional paths compile
Acceptance Criteria:
- No CS0246/CS0234 from Deform symbols
- Test scene loads without compile errors

title: Complete RuntimeGenerationManager and PrimitiveTerrainManager behavior (beyond minimal stubs)
body:
Context: Minimal implementations added to satisfy tests (queue/events; runtime primitive spawns).
Tasks:
- Flesh out task execution (terrain, structures, primitives)
- Add load balancing and time budget enforcement
- Integrate with PerformanceMonitor (Map) for adaptive throttling
Acceptance Criteria:
- Integration tests pass without warnings
- Metrics exposed via debug UI

title: Unify UI namespaces across scenes and prefabs
body:
Context: Code namespaces unified to Vastcore.UI; validate scene/prefab script references.
Tasks:
- Open all scenes, fix missing MonoBehaviour due to namespace change
- Update prefabs referencing old NarrativeGen.UI scripts
Acceptance Criteria:
- No Missing Script warnings on scene load

title: Add TestAssemblies optional reference to Vastcore.Testing.asmdef in CI
body:
Context: optionalUnityReferences: ["TestAssemblies"] added locally.
Tasks:
- Ensure CI/Builder includes test framework assemblies
- Verify PlayMode tests discover and run
Acceptance Criteria:
- CI can compile and run tests without manual editor setup
